name: Rewind (itch) (Twingamerz06(New Account))
description:
You play as a poor soul  going back to your tragic past.

You play as a man named Jonathan going back to your house you grew up in.

While exploring the house you find your old traumas.

While exploring the house you find your old toys .

What scarred you as a kid is back to kill you and using only your flashlight you must

collect all four toys and leave burning them to banish the haunting memories forever.

Oh .…...And Don't stand to close;
